title: The height restriction in Koregaon Park Area shall be as per special regulations applicable in Koreg
clause_text: The height restriction in Koregaon Park Area shall be as per special regulations applicable in Koregaon Park Area as below - The Circuit House - Fitzgerald Bridge Road on the west.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
